body: Elves are renowned for their subtlety and skill. Elves with this racial trait reduce the penalty for using Stealth while moving by 5 and can make Stealth checks while running at a –20 penalty (this number includes the penalty reduction from this racial trait). This racial trait replaces elven magic.
name: Silent Hunter
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Elves/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Silent Hunter
